name: Information Breach
description:
The internet is full of information that helps millions of users daily. However, the legitimacy of this type of information can be sketchy. Can you help share the right information?

In this game you become an avatar in an online world, where opinions and information are spread everywhere. Gain knowledge by talking with other internet users, and beware of those that their main purpose is to remove the knowledge out of you.
